page.title: 18Life in New Addington
page.content: On Saturday mornings I get up at about 8.30am and I watch telly all the way through till 12.15pm.Somtimes I watch or play football but now the football seasons over theres not much to do but near May 18th-20th the fair comes up on Milne Park green but only for a week.Somtimes I go exploring in the woods with friends or I go to stay with relatives.On Sundays I get up about 9.00am and theres nothing on telly I just sit indoors and do some reading or drawing and writing.Apart from that theres nothing else to do.I think they should put an adventure playground near us.The nearest one is Crystal Palace.It is too far away to go on a bus.All the parks near us are ruined by vandals.The only decent one is too far to walk but if you are bored you might as well take a walk.Croydon has the nearest cinema.I think they should open one in Addington
